creditline: Gift of Anne-Lise and David Whitescarver
description: abstracted, slightly Cubist style image; green element in LRC with white "R" at top on a black rectangle; line sketch of a face in ULQ; purple rectangular elements at center; vertical black line at center; stack of books in LRQ; white rectangle with black text in LLQ with a colorful abstract image in orange, white, and turquoise on top of it; received in a whitewashed distressed frame
signed: LLC in black: JS | on verso in black: \"The Green Magazine\" / by Jos. Solman / DO NOT VARNISH / ACA / DO NOT VARNISH!
title: The Green Magazine
